description:
Set mute correctly from the audio API.
Currently audio.setProperties is ignoring the mute value passed in by the user. This CL fixes it.

Reviews requested,
hshi@ - general
mpcomplete - OWNERS for audio_service_chromeos.cc

R=hshi@chromium.org
BUG=239562

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=199325

messages.text: Added Matt for an owners review.

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc
File chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc#newcode149
chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc:149: cras_audio_handler_->SetMuteForDevice(GetIdFromStr(device_id), muted);
nit: it seems inefficient to call GetIdFromStr(device_id) multiple times. You've already obtained |device|, can you just use device.id?

lgtm with one extra nit

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h
File chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h#newcode151
chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h:151: // Sets the mute for device.
nit: "mute" as a noun means a mute person. maybe "mute state" is more appropriate.

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc
File chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc#newcode149
chrome/browser/extensions/api/audio/audio_service_chromeos.cc:149: cras_audio_handler_->SetMuteForDevice(GetIdFromStr(device_id), muted);
On 2013/05/09 20:02:12, hshi1 wrote:
> nit: it seems inefficient to call GetIdFromStr(device_id) multiple times. You've
> already obtained |device|, can you just use device.id?

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h
File chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14773020/diff/1/chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h#newcode151
chromeos/audio/cras_audio_handler.h:151: // Sets the mute for device.
On 2013/05/09 20:15:25, hshi1 wrote:
> nit: "mute" as a noun means a mute person. maybe "mute state" is more
> appropriate.

Changed it to mute_on. Also makes it consistent with all other places.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/rkc@chromium.org/14773020/9001

subject: Set mute correctly from the audio API.
